62b5(khri pa): na/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
62b6(khri pa): la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad cing / de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de bzhin du gang mtshan
62b7(khri pa): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la
63a1(khri pa): nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ grub pa dang bde ba la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par
63a2(khri pa): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni spong ba'i khams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod
63a3(khri pa): pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings dang / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad pa dang / de bzhin du de ni tshor ba dang /
63a4(khri pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni
63a5(khri pa): khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
63a6(khri pa): dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
63a7(khri pa): rab 'byor/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
63b1(khri pa): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
63b2(khri pa): chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nas/ de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid la nges par
63b3(khri pa): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
63b4(khri pa): gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad
63b5(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
63b6(khri pa): tshor ba'i bar du stong pa dang / de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
63b7(khri pa): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rmi lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la
64a1(khri pa): nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la nges par
64a2(khri pa): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
64a3(khri pa): nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams
64a4(khri pa): gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo
64a5(khri pa): bo nyid ni rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i
64a6(khri pa): ngo bo nyid kyi bar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung
64a7(khri pa): par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par
64b1(khri pa): 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
64b2(khri pa): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum
64b3(khri pa): nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
64b4(khri pa): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par
64b5(khri pa): 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sbyin
64b6(khri pa): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing / rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
64b7(khri pa): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
65a1(khri pa): de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du
65a2(khri pa): zad do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la nges par
65a3(khri pa): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
65a4(khri pa): pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad
65a5(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing / de ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos
65a6(khri pa): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod
65a7(khri pa): pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni
65b1(khri pa): khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
65b2(khri pa): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag
65b3(khri pa): par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
65b4(khri pa): nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par
65b5(khri pa): 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
65b6(khri pa): bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
65b7(khri pa): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par bstan pa kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o//
66a1(khri pa): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du
66a2(khri pa): zad do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
66a3(khri pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum
66a4(khri pa): nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom
66a5(khri pa): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / / de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
66a6(khri pa): stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du
66a7(khri pa): zad do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
66b1(khri pa): bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
66b2(khri pa): lag brgyad par ji skad du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni
66b3(khri pa): ming la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni brda dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa la nges
66b4(khri pa): par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar ming gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad
66b5(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar ming gi stong pa nyid ni ming gi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ btags
66b6(khri pa): pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar ni btags pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang
66b7(khri pa): yin pa de ni skye ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang
67a1(khri pa): yin pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du
67a2(khri pa): bya ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ ming gi skabs su ji skad du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
67a3(khri pa): des na theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing der yang mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /shes rab kyi
67a4(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
67a5(khri pa): bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ theg pa de ni gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
67a6(khri pa): rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gnas pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa ste/ 'on kyang theg pa de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ dper
67a7(khri pa): na| chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin te/ le'u
67b1(khri pa): gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du theg pa de ni gnas
67b2(khri pa): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon
67b3(khri pa): par 'du byed pa med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
67b4(khri pa): rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni chos kyi
67b5(khri pa): dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
67b6(khri pa): des na theg pa de ni gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de'ang mi gnas par gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis so/ /yang rab 'byor/ gang 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig nges par 'byung bar
67b7(khri pa): 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ theg pa des su'ang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar theg pa gang yin pa de dang / gang nges par 'byung
68a1(khri pa): bar 'gyur ba dang / gang du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar chos thams cad med
68a2(khri pa): cing mi dmigs na/ chos gang zhig gis su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ gang du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar bdag dang de bzhin du
68a3(khri pa): sbyar te/ shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir bdag gtan mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sems can dang / skye ba po nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes pa
68a4(khri pa): po dang mthong ba po'i bar du gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
68a5(khri pa): de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
68a6(khri pa): phyir phung po dang khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir khams dang skye mched rnams mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol
68a7(khri pa): tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
68b1(khri pa): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /de
68b2(khri pa): bzhin du sbyar te/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag
68b3(khri pa): pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun
68b4(khri pa): du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin
68b5(khri pa): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so/ /de
68b6(khri pa): bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa
68b7(khri pa): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
69a1(khri pa): phyir/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa
69a2(khri pa): med pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar mi dmigs so/ /
69a3(khri pa): de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba dang / mi 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / skye ba mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'grib pa dang / 'phel
69a4(khri pa): ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /ci zhig dmigs su med pas mi dmigs she na/ chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam
69a5(khri pa): par dag pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings ni sus kyang ma dmigs/ mi dmigs/ gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi dbyings dmigs su
69a6(khri pa): med pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / shes rab
69a7(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs
69b1(khri pa): su med pas mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su med
69b2(khri pa): pas mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du dmigs su med pas
69b3(khri pa): mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du dmigs
69b4(khri pa): su med pas mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du skye ba med pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i bar du dmigs su med pas
69b5(khri pa): mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sa dang po dmigs
69b6(khri pa): su med pas mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su mi dmigs so/ /de las bcu po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i
69b7(khri pa): sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bya ba byas pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang
70a1(khri pa): chub sems dpa'i sa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid ni bcu pa'o/ /de la nang stong pa nyid las dang po dmigs su med do/ /de
70a2(khri pa): bzhin du gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa dmigs su med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar
70a3(khri pa): te| shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las dang po dmigs su med pa nas/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs
70a4(khri pa): su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sa dang po ni sus kyang ma dmigs/ mi dmigs te/ gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
70a5(khri pa): sa bcu pa'i bar du sus kyang ma dmigs/ mi dmigs la/ gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la sems
70a6(khri pa): can yongs su smin par bya ba mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam
70a7(khri pa): par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi dmigs pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
70b1(khri pa): su dag par bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la mig lnga mi dmigs pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mig lnga mi
70b2(khri pa): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen
70b3(khri pa): pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
70b4(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
70b5(khri pa): lags so| / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ dper na/ nam
70b6(khri pa): mkha' la ni 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa mi mngon lags so/ /de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa mi mngon lags so/ /dper na/ nam
70b7(khri pa): mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs shing / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs lags so/ /de bzhin du theg pa de la'ang sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang / /
71a1(khri pa): dbus mi dmigs te/ dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas de'i slad du theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
71a2(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa
71a3(khri pa): ste| des na theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
71a4(khri pa): theg pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
71a5(khri pa): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
71a6(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong
71a7(khri pa): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/
71b1(khri pa): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad de/ 'di lta ste/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ nam mkha'
71b2(khri pa): ltar chags pa med cing rnam par grol la gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta
71b3(khri pa): ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas
71b4(khri pa): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yin no/ / //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ yang rab 'byor/ 'di skad du theg
71b5(khri pa): pa de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa la/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten de gang zhe na/
71b6(khri pa): 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams so/ /rab 'byor/ gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin du 'gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan
71b7(khri pa): ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/
72a1(khri pa): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung
72a2(khri pa): bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis bstan pa ste/ mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur
72a3(khri pa): ba'i chos can yin te/ dngos po med pa'i bar du yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas
72a4(khri pa): nges par 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams nas de bzhin du 'gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma
72a5(khri pa): log pa dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos po med pa ma yin na
72a6(khri pa): ni| theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi
72a7(khri pa): phyir gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag /mi brtan zhing / ther zug ma
72b1(khri pa): yin la/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par
72b2(khri pa): 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ gal te gzugs de bzhin du 'gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang /
72b3(khri pa): thams cad rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma
72b4(khri pa): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir gzugs ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis
72b5(khri pa): bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag /mi brtan zhing / ther zug ma yin la/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi
72b6(khri pa): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang
72b7(khri pa): gzugs la ji ltar sbyar ba bzhin du bya'o/ /de bzhin du mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de bzhin du gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang /
73a1(khri pa): dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched dang / de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du
73a2(khri pa): mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du ma nor ba dang /
73a3(khri pa): gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin
73a4(khri pa): la| dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba
73a5(khri pa): zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag/ mi
73a6(khri pa): brtan zhing / ther zug ma yin la/ 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi bar du yin te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
73a7(khri pa): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te chos kyi dbyings dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg
73b1(khri pa): pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings ni dngos
73b2(khri pa): po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar
73b3(khri pa): te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid dngos po zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin la/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yin te/ dngos
73b4(khri pa): po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab
73b5(khri pa): 'byor/ gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi
73b6(khri pa): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin
73b7(khri pa): na ni theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir
74a1(khri pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
74a2(khri pa): zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
74a3(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog
74a4(khri pa): 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes
74a5(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges
74a6(khri pa): par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/
74a7(khri pa): theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang
74b1(khri pa): gi phyir nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
74b2(khri pa): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen
74b3(khri pa): po| theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir dran pa nye bar
74b4(khri pa): bzhag pa rnams dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
74b5(khri pa): ro| / rab 'byor/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
74b6(khri pa): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dngos po yin te/
74b7(khri pa): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab
75a1(khri pa): 'byor/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di
75a2(khri pa): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te rigs kyi chos dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma
75a3(khri pa): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor
75a4(khri pa): gang gi phyir rigs kyi chos dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par
75a5(khri pa): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gal te brgyad pa'i chos rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi
75a6(khri pa): 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
75a7(khri pa): kyi chos rnams dngos po yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par
75b1(khri pa): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha
75b2(khri pa): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te rigs kyi sa'i gang zag rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma
75b3(khri pa): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi
75b4(khri pa): phyir rigs kyi sa'i gang zag rnams dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/
75b5(khri pa): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du brgyad pa'i gang zag dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs
75b6(khri pa): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gang zag dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di
75b7(khri pa): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir brgyad pa'i gang zag dang / de bzhin gshegs
76a1(khri pa): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gang zag gi bar du dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha
76a2(khri pa): dang me dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos
76a3(khri pa): po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar
76a4(khri pa): mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang
76a5(khri pa): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang po bskyed
76a6(khri pa): pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar skabs der sems gang dang gang dag bskyed pa de dag thams cad dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg
76a7(khri pa): pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir byang
76b1(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar skabs der sems gang dang gang dag bskyed pa de dag thams
76b2(khri pa): cad dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab
76b3(khri pa): 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang
76b4(khri pa): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes
76b5(khri pa): dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor
76b6(khri pa): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag
76b7(khri pa): chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/
77a1(khri pa): rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
77a2(khri pa): sems dpa' chen pos bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes
77a3(khri pa): su 'thob cing lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
77a4(khri pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
77a5(khri pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas spa zhing mdzes par mi
77a6(khri pa): 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
77a7(khri pa): dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
77b1(khri pa): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od dngos po yin
77b2(khri pa): te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu khyab
77b3(khri pa): par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
77b4(khri pa): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu khyab bo/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
77b5(khri pa): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
77b6(khri pa): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i gsung gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu go bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi
77b7(khri pa): p hyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po med pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
78a1(khri pa): d ag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i gsung gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
78a2(khri pa): tu go bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
78a3(khri pa): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis 'jig rten du
78a4(khri pa): chos dang mthun par ma bskor bskor bar mi 'gyur bzhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo
78a5(khri pa): dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram za'am/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang zhes bya
78a6(khri pa): ba'i bar gyis ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gi ched du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can thams cad dngos po yin
78a7(khri pa): te| dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag thams cad phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
78b1(khri pa): par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gi ched du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag thams cad dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir sems
78b2(khri pa): can de dag thams cad phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
78b3(khri pa): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa lags so zhes smras pa ni/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ theg pa de ni nam
78b4(khri pa): mkha' dang mnyam pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni shar phyogs mngon pa med do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs mngon pa med/ steng gi phyogs
78b5(khri pa): dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams bzhi'ang mngon pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de la'ang shar phyogs mngon par med do/ /lho phyogs
78b6(khri pa): dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs mngon pa med/ steng gi phyogs dang / 'og gi phyogs mngon pa med do/ /phyogs mtshams mngon pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha'
78b7(khri pa): ni ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ lham pa ma yin/ zlum pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog kyang ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ lham
79a1(khri pa): pa ma yin/ zlum po ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin/ dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin /
79a2(khri pa): btsod ka ma yin/ ser skya ma yin/ gser lta bu ma yin/ sre'o ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de'ang sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin /
79a3(khri pa): dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ btsod ka ma yin/ ser skya ma yin/ gser lta bu ma yin/ sre'o ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /
79a4(khri pa): rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de'ang
79a5(khri pa): 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni
79a6(khri pa): 'grib pa med/ 'phel ba med/ yongs su 'bri ba dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de la'ang 'grib pa med/ 'phel ba med /
79a7(khri pa): yongs su 'bri ba dmigs su med de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med/ gnas pa
79b1(khri pa): med/ gzhan du 'gyur ba dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa de la'ang skye ba med/ 'gag pa med/ gnas pa med/ gzhan du 'gyur ba dmigs su med do/ de'i phyir
79b2(khri pa): theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ lung bstan du yod pa ma yin/ lung du ma bstan pa ma
79b3(khri pa): yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa de'ang dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ lung bstan du yod pa ma yin/ lung du ma bstan pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam
79b4(khri pa): mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ dran pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
79b5(khri pa): theg pa chen po de'ang mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ dran pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper
79b6(khri pa): na/ nam mkha' ni shes par bya ba ma yin/ mngon par shes par bya ba ma yin/ yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/ spang bar bya ba ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba ma yin/ bsgom
79b7(khri pa): par bya ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang shes par bya ba ma yin/ mngon par shes par bya ba ma yin/ yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/ spang bar bya ba ma yin/
80a1(khri pa): mngon sum du bya ba ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam
80a2(khri pa): mkha' ni rnam par smin pa ma yin/ rnam par smin pa'i chos can ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang rnam par smin pa ma yin/ rnam par smin pa'i chos can
80a3(khri pa): ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi
80a4(khri pa): khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin /
80a5(khri pa): gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta
80a6(khri pa): ste| dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos can ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gti mug dang bral ba'i bar gyi chos can ma
80a7(khri pa): yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos can ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gti mug dang bral
80b1(khri pa): ba'i bar gyi chos can ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sems dang po bskyed pa dmigs su med/ gnyis
80b2(khri pa): pa med/ gsum pa med/ bzhi pa med/ lnga pa med/ drug pa med/ bdun pa med/ brgyad pa med/ dgu pa med/ sems bskyed pa bcu pa dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
80b3(khri pa): du theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de'ang sems bskyed pa dang po dang bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do/ /de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab
80b4(khri pa): 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med/ rigs kyi sa med/ brgyad pa'i sa med/ mthong ba'i sa med/ bsrabs pa'i sa med/ 'dod chags
80b5(khri pa): dang bral ba'i sa med/ byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de la'ang dkar po rnam
80b6(khri pa): par mthong ba'i sa med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du med de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs
80b7(khri pa): pa'i 'bras bu med pa nas/ rang byang chub kyi bar du med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med pa nas/ rang byang chub kyi bar du
81a1(khri pa): med de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni nyan thos kyi sa med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
81a2(khri pa): sa med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang nyan thos kyi sa med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med/ yang dag par
81a3(khri pa): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa med de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni gzugs can ma yin/ gzugs can
81a4(khri pa): ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ bstan du yod pa ma yin/ bstan du med pa'ang ma yin/ thogs pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ thogs pa med pa'ang ma yin zhing / chos gang dang yang lhan
81a5(khri pa): cig ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gzugs can ma yin/ gzugs can ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ bstan du yod pa ma
81a6(khri pa): yin/ bstan du med pa'ang ma yin/ thogs pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ thogs pa med pa'ang ma yin zhing / chos gang dang yang lhan cig ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
81a7(khri pa): te| de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag pa ma yin/ bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin /
81b1(khri pa): bdag yod pa ma yin/ bdag med pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag pa ma yin/ bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ bdag yod
81b2(khri pa): pa ma yin/ bdag med pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni stong pa ma yin/ mi stong pa ma yin/ mtshan
81b3(khri pa): ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ smon pa yod pa ma yin/ smon pa med pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang stong pa ma yin/ mi stong pa ma yin/
81b4(khri pa): mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ smon pa yod pa ma yin/ smon pa med pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
81b5(khri pa): dper na/ nam mkha' ni zhi ba ma yin/ ma zhi ba'ang ma yin/ dben pa ma yin/ mi dben pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang zhi ba ma yin/ ma zhi ba'ang
81b6(khri pa): ma yin/ dben pa ma yin/ mi dpen pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni mun pa ma yin/ snang
81b7(khri pa): ba'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang mun pa ma yin/ snang ba'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper
82a1(khri pa): na| nam mkha' ni dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang dmigs su med cing / dmigs su med pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir
82a2(khri pa): theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni brjod du yod pa ma yin/ brjod du med pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg
82a3(khri pa): pa chen po de'ang brjod du yod pa ma yin/ brjod du med pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ theg pa
82a4(khri pa): chen po zhes bya ba'i theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ yang 'di skad ces ji ltar nam mkha' ni sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag
82a5(khri pa): gi go 'byed lags so/ /de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de'ang sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa'i go 'byed lags so zhes smras pa ni/ rab 'byor/
82a6(khri pa): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ yang dag par smras so/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi go 'byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg
82a7(khri pa): pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de'ang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi go 'byed do/ /rab 'byor/ sems can med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o/ /nam
82b1(khri pa): mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de'ang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa'i go 'byed
82b2(khri pa): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar sems can gang dag yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i
82b3(khri pa): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang sems can tshad med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' tshad med par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir yang theg pa chen po tshad med par rig
82b4(khri pa): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de'ang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi go 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems
82b5(khri pa): can gang dag phan pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor/ dper na/
82b6(khri pa): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar ni/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa dag gi go 'byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de'ang
82b7(khri pa): sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa dag gi go 'byed do/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de ni sems can dpag tu med grangs med
83a1(khri pa): tshad med pa dag gi go 'byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang yang 'di skad ces theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba'ang mi gda'/ 'gro ba'ang mi
83a2(khri pa): gda'/ gnas pa'ang mi gda' lags so zhes smras pa ni/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ yang dag par smras so/ /rab 'byor/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog de la ni 'ong
83a3(khri pa): ba'ang mi snang / 'gro ba dang gnas pa'ang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni g.yo ba med pa ste/ de'i phyir gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro
83a4(khri pa): ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa
83a5(khri pa): med cing / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa
83a6(khri pa): dang / rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
83b1(khri pa): gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshor
83b2(khri pa): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/
83b3(khri pa): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam
83b4(khri pa): par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ mig
83b5(khri pa): dang / mig gi rang bzhin dang / mig gi de bzhin nyid dang / mig gi ngo bo nyid dang / mig gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang
83b6(khri pa): gnas pa med pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / yid kyi rang bzhin dang / yid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / yid kyi ngo bo nyid dang / yid kyi ngo bo nyid
83b7(khri pa): kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ sa'i khams dang / sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / sa'i khams
84a1(khri pa): kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/
84a2(khri pa): gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rnam par
84a3(khri pa): shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid
84a4(khri pa): kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba
84a5(khri pa): med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo
84a6(khri pa): nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang
84a7(khri pa): bzhin dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang
84b1(khri pa): 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
84b2(khri pa): dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang
84b3(khri pa): 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin
84b4(khri pa): nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med
84b5(khri pa): pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
84b6(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / shes rab kyi
84b7(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
85a1(khri pa): rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
85a2(khri pa): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
85a3(khri pa): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gong ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub
85a4(khri pa): kyi ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas dang /
85a5(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang
85a6(khri pa): du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor/ 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi de
85a7(khri pa): bzhin nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang
85b1(khri pa): gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ theg
85b2(khri pa): pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par gnas pas/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o zhes smras pa ni/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad
85b3(khri pa): smras pa bzhin no/ /theg pa chen po de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
85b4(khri pa): du rnam par gnas pas de'i phyir theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus ni 'das pa'i dus kyis stong / ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni ma 'ongs pa'i
85b5(khri pa): dus kyis stong / da ltar byung ba'i dus ni da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong / theg pa chen po ni theg pa chen pos stong /
85b6(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid ni gcig ma yin/ gnyis ma yin/ gsum ma yin/ bzhi ma yin/ lnga ma yin zhing / tha
85b7(khri pa): dad pa'ang med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te/ de la ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /'dod chags
86a1(khri pa): dang 'dod chags dang bral ba mi dmigs so/ /zhe sdang dang zhe sdang dang bral ba mi dmigs so/ /gti mug dang gti mug dang bral ba dang / nga rgyal
86a2(khri pa): yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ dge ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba rnams dang / lung du bstan pa rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so/ /rtag
86a3(khri pa): pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /de la ni bdag dang bdag med
86a4(khri pa): pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /de la ni 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par
86a5(khri pa): 'da' ba mi dmigs so/ /gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
86a6(khri pa): ltar dngos po med pa ni dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong / ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs
86a7(khri pa): kyis stong / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par
86b1(khri pa): shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam
86b2(khri pa): par shes pas stong pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ 'das pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas
86b3(khri pa): dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong
86b4(khri pa): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i
86b5(khri pa): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das
86b6(khri pa): pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
86b7(khri pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa dang / da
87a1(khri pa): ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
87a2(khri pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin
87a3(khri pa): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ chos mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so/ /ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
87a4(khri pa): byung ba'i dus mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ re zhig mnyam pa nyid la ni mnyam pa nyid kyang dmigs su med na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de
87a5(khri pa): bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
87a6(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/
87a7(khri pa): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs
87b1(khri pa): so| |dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
87b2(khri pa): de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs
87b3(khri pa): so| |rab 'byor/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar
87b4(khri pa): mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i
87b5(khri pa): mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi
87b6(khri pa): mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir
87b7(khri pa): zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos ni da ltar byung
88a1(khri pa): bar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid
88a2(khri pa): kyi phyir ro/ /de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni
88a3(khri pa): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin
88a4(khri pa): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub
88a5(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dus gsum po dag la bslabs la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/
88a6(khri pa): rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
88a7(khri pa): chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo / / //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
88b1(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
88b2(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bka' stsal pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems
88b3(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di nyid la bslabs pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
88b4(khri pa): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /btsun
88b5(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis pa gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma
88b6(khri pa): mchis/ chad ma mchis pa dag na mchis pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po/ theg pa rab mchog 'di la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob lags te/ btsun pa bcom
88b7(khri pa): ldan 'das/ de'i slad du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
89a1(khri pa): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
89a2(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'das pa rnams kyis theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob bo/ /gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar
89a3(khri pa): ' gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes
89a4(khri pa): su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
89a5(khri pa): rgyas dpag tu med pa gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa de dag kyang / theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
89a6(khri pa): ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
89a7(khri pa): pa na/ chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog par byed/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/
89b1(khri pa): nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du byang
89b2(khri pa): chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la
89b3(khri pa): mngon par zhen pa'ang med do/ /smras pa/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa de gang dag yin/ smras pa/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang
89b4(khri pa): mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de ltar gong ma bzhin du
89b5(khri pa): sbyar te/ skye mched kyi bar gyi rnam pa shes te/ de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin du
89b6(khri pa): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du de bzhin
89b7(khri pa): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi rnam pa shes te/ de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang
90a1(khri pa): ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa
90a2(khri pa): gang yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs rnams
90a3(khri pa): sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ ro rnams sam/ reg rnams sam/ chos rnams sam/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kyi bar dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos
90a4(khri pa): 'dzin pa ste/ rnam pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/
90a5(khri pa): blo gros de ring du song ba yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ gang las ring du song ba yin/ smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ phung po
90a6(khri pa): rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams las ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams las ring du song / 'gro ba drug po dag las ring du
90a7(khri pa): song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
90b1(khri pa): pa las ring du song / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing / dngos po med
90b2(khri pa): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar
90b3(khri pa): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /thams
90b4(khri pa): cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
90b5(khri pa): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ de ni ring du song ba yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa de ni gang yin zhes
90b6(khri pa): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs bde zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
90b7(khri pa): gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/
91a1(khri pa): gzugs bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa yod pa
91a2(khri pa): dang / smon pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
91a3(khri pa): dang / rnam par shes pa bdag tu nye bar mi rtog pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ dben pa dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
91a4(khri pa): pa la'ang sbyar bar bya ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang
91a5(khri pa): sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi
91a6(khri pa): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
91a7(khri pa): sgo thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang
91b1(khri pa): ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon
91b2(khri pa): pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / mi dben pa zhes bya ba'i bar du mi rtog ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
91b3(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ de ltar chos thams cad la nye bar rtog par byed do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
91b4(khri pa): ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir 'di skad du gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
91b5(khri pa): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /de bzhin du ci'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa
91b6(khri pa): de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags zhes smra/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan
91b7(khri pa): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ gzugs ni skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
92a1(khri pa): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
92a2(khri pa): dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa ni skye ba med do/ /
92a3(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /
92a4(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do//
92a5(khri pa): de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
92a6(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
92a7(khri pa): des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ nang stong pa nyid la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar
