121b2(khri pa): pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyis/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs
121b3(khri pa): pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gang bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / bstan pa'i chos 'di ni a la la legs par bshad pa'o/ /
121b4(khri pa): a la la chos 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o/ /a la la chos 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o/ /zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121b5(khri pa): chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral ba 'di ni bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du
121b6(khri pa): shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyang theg pa gsum rnam
121b7(khri pa): par dgod pa'ang mdzad do/ /theg pa gsum po/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'dogs pa'ang
122a1(khri pa): mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /khyed ji
122a2(khri pa): skad zer ba bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag /'di lta ste/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
122a3(khri pa): nyid kyi bar du chos gang yang dmigs su med kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa'ang mdzad de/ theg pa gsum po/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
122a4(khri pa): kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang 'dogs par mdzad do/ /lha'i bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang
122a5(khri pa): ma bral la/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yin pa de ni/ khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du zung zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
122a6(khri pa): 'dir theg pa gsum po/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag rgya cher bstan cing /
122a7(khri pa): lha'i bu dag /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs
122b1(khri pa): pa dmigs su med/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
122b2(khri pa): pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
122b3(khri pa): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin
122b4(khri pa): gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ lha'i bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' yang de dag thams cad la slob ste/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/
122b5(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa'i phyir te/ lha'i bu dag/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang
122b6(khri pa): ma bral bar spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lha'i bu dang / nga gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad
122b7(khri pa): la| rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor pad+ma can du pad+ma lnga gtor te tshong 'dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ de bzhin
123a1(khri pa): du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
123a2(khri pa): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye
123a3(khri pa): bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang bral bar ma gyur/ de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
123a4(khri pa): bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
123a5(khri pa): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang bral bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa
123a6(khri pa): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis/ nga la kye rigs kyi bu/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
123a7(khri pa): nyid du bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig
123b1(khri pa): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bla na med pa
123b2(khri pa): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du shes rab
123b3(khri pa): k yi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtong ba'i tshul gyis phan 'dogs pa ni ngo mtshar lags
123b4(khri pa): so|| ||'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong dang / dge slong
123b5(khri pa): ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'og min gyi bar gyi
123b6(khri pa): lha rnams 'dus par gyur te/ 'khod par thugs su chung nas thams cad dbang du btsugs te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems
123b7(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo gang la la zhig gis bcom ldan 'das
124a1(khri pa): ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar gyur pa de la bdud sdig can nam/ bdud
124a2(khri pa): kyi ris kyi lha glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags dang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des gzugs stong pa nyid du shin tu
124a3(khri pa): byin gyis brlabs shing / de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed rnams stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid du shin tu byin gyis
124a4(khri pa): brlabs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa
124a5(khri pa): med pa la glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid du shin tu byin gyis
124a6(khri pa): brlabs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa
124a7(khri pa): med pa la glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis de dag la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag la ngo bo
124b1(khri pa): nyid med pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la mi'am/ mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyi sa glags mi rnyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /'di ltar
124b2(khri pa): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems shin tu bsgoms shing / de bzhin du snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms
124b3(khri pa): kyi sems shin tu bsgoms te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gshis ngan du 'chi bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /
124b4(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/ sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i bde ba nye bar bsgrubs pas bsnyen
124b5(khri pa): bkur byas pa'i phyir ro/ /gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral
124b6(khri pa): rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs pa rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / 'bras
124b7(khri pa): bu che ba gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos nas ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang /
125a1(khri pa): kun chub par ma byas pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rtag tu mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcad par bya/ kun chub bar
125a2(khri pa): bya| tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar bya'o/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag shes
125a3(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
125a4(khri pa): dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag khang stong na 'dug kyang rung / bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung / 'dun khang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs
125a5(khri pa): pa'am/ bag tsha ba'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rtag tu mi dmigs
125a6(khri pa): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shin tu bsgoms shing / de bzhin du rtag tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid shin tu bsgoms/ de bzhin tu rtag tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul
125a7(khri pa): gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ 'di
125b1(khri pa): lta ste/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul
125b2(khri pa): dbang byed rnams nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi lha 'khod pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
125b3(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'chad pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa
125b4(khri pa): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la bdag cag gis rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / bskyab
125b5(khri pa): par bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad par
125b6(khri pa): 'gyur/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur/ lha dbul po rnams dang / klu dbul pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang / mi dbul po rnams dang / yams
125b7(khri pa): kyi bron da thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / bro nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams mi skye mi 'byung zhing sel bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin du mu ge dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug thams
126a1(khri pa): cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ sel bar 'gyur zhing ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
126a2(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung zhing / de bzhin du bsam gtan gzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
126a3(khri pa): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha
126a4(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag
126a5(khri pa): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung
126a6(khri pa): bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag 'jig rten du
126a7(khri pa): 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub
126b1(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas rgyal rigs shing sA chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag
126b2(khri pa): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta ba dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams 'jig rten
126b3(khri pa): du 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams mchis lags so/ /
126b4(khri pa): de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams mchis lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
126b5(khri pa): 'bras bu mchis lags so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
126b6(khri pa): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mchis lags so/ /rang byang chub mchis lags so/ /rang sangs rgyas mchis lags so/ /btsun pa
126b7(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba mchis lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
127a1(khri pa): su dag par bgyi ba ma chis lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs lags so/ /chos kyi
127a2(khri pa): 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas dkon mchog bzhugs lags so/ /chos dkon mchog bzhugs lags so/ /dge 'dun dkon
127a3(khri pa): mchog bzhugs lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab
127a4(khri pa): pa dang / spa bar bgyi ba lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /khyod kyis ji
127a5(khri pa): skad smras pa bzhin te/ kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams
127a6(khri pa): rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ da bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du
127a7(khri pa): chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kau shi ka/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni lha dang mi dang lha
127b1(khri pa): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya zhing / de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o/ /
127b2(khri pa): kau shi ka /gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mo bya ba dang / mchod pa bya bar sems pa de ni/ nga la bsti stang du
127b3(khri pa): bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri me bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa yin no/ /kau shi ka /de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
127b4(khri pa): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rtag tu bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mo bya/ mchod pa bya zhing / de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o/ /kau shi
127b5(khri pa): ka |stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sha stag gis/ 'di lta ste/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram
127b6(khri pa): shing gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad
127b7(khri pa): kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral
128a1(khri pa): pa gcig la bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas na/ de nyid rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ches bsod nams mang du
128a2(khri pa): bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
128a3(khri pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa ma yin gyi/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
128a4(khri pa): rgyas thams cad dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka /de lta bas na
128a5(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rtag tu bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mo bya/ mchod pa bya zhing / de
128a6(khri pa): dag la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ rnam par rtog pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad
128b1(khri pa): du snang ba bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
128b2(khri pa): phyin pa ni khams gsum gyis mi gos pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mongs pa dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi rab rib sel
128b3(khri pa): bar bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs thams cad kyi sngon du mchi ba lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
128b4(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde bar bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha
128b5(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa ni mig yongs su gzung ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la snang ba bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtha' gnyis
128b6(khri pa): rnam par spangs pa'i slad du lam gol bar zhugs pa rnams la lam ston pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags
128b7(khri pa): dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
129a1(khri pa): thams cad skyed pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang
129a2(khri pa): gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ther zug tu gnas
129a3(khri pa): pa dang / 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'khor ba rnam par spong bar bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che thams cad stsol
129a4(khri pa): ba'i slad du mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi brdzi
129a5(khri pa): ba'i slad du stobs yongs su rdzogs pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bskor ba dang ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lan gsum du bzlas
129a6(khri pa): te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor bar bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
129a7(khri pa): kyi slad du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par ston pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'am/ nyan thos
129b1(khri pa): kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar ston pa la gnas
129b2(khri pa): par bya ba dang / ji ltar ston pa la phyag bya ba ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la'ang de ltar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
129b3(khri pa): nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa'ang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin gyi/ ston pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
129b4(khri pa): nyid ston pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rab tu phye ba yin zhing / de
129b5(khri pa): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i bar du rab tu phye ba dang / shes rab
129b6(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten la rab tu phye ba dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
129b7(khri pa): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang / nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
130a1(khri pa): pa nyid kyi bar dag 'jig rten la rab tu phye ba yin no/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu phye ba nas/
130a2(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag rab tu phye zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rab tu phye ba'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ tshe dang
130a3(khri pa): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i zhu ba 'di ga las byung / gleng gzhi ni gang zhig yin snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa
130a4(khri pa): ti'i bu/ zhu ba 'di ga las byung / gleng gzhi ni gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus la'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems
130a5(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin pa rnams ni thabs la mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de
130a6(khri pa): dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar skabs der dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
130a7(khri pa): dang bcas pa de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag dang / da las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad
130b1(khri pa): bzlums shing mngon par bsdus te/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pas kho bo'i zhu ba 'di byung ngo / /kau shi
130b2(khri pa): ka/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha
130b3(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon par byed pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ dper na/
130b4(khri pa): dmus long rnams ni brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum yang rung ste/ dmigs bu med na lam du 'gro'am/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ yul 'khor du 'jug par mi nus
130b5(khri pa): te| ji ltar de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba la skal ba med cing 'os pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/ kau shi ka /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dmus long lta bur gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha
130b6(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa'i dmigs bu med pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na de ni/ 'di lta ste/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam nas lam du 'jug pa'am/ rnam pa thams
130b7(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du 'jug pa'i skal ba med do/ /kau shi ka /gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
131a1(khri pa): su zin par gyur na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag mig dang ldan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa yin te/ lnga po 'di dag kyang pha
131a2(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
131a3(khri pa): phyin pas yongs su bzung na/ lnga po 'di dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo zhes smras na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'o na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
131a4(khri pa): yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bam/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung
131a5(khri pa): ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba lnga po 'di dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bam/
131a6(khri pa): smras pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
131a7(khri pa): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
131b1(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /kau shi ka /de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi nang na mchog ces bya/ gtso bo dang / rab mchog dang / gya
131b2(khri pa): nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha
131b3(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs
131b4(khri pa): mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par bsgrub
131b5(khri pa): tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i
131b6(khri pa): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar
131b7(khri pa): bzhag pa rnams nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mngon
132a1(khri pa): par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam
132a2(khri pa): pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ btsun
132a3(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na gzugs mngon par bsgrub tu ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
132a4(khri pa): ba nyid kyi bar du mngon par bsgrub tu ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
132a5(khri pa): gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i phyir dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
132a6(khri pa): mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
132a7(khri pa): bar du mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i phyir dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
132b1(khri pa): bsgrub par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol
132b2(khri pa): tu phyin pa de ltar mngon par bsgrubs na chos gang zhig thob par bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gang yang thob par mi byed de/ des na shes rab kyi pha
132b3(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ chos ci yang thob par mi bgyid pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
132b4(khri pa): ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas
132b5(khri pa): pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i chos rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang /
132b6(khri pa): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams thob par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang dag la'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar
132b7(khri pa): gnas pa ma yin te/ des na de ni chos gang yang thob par mi byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
133a1(khri pa): ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid cing dmigs par mi bgyid lags sam/ bcom ldan
133a2(khri pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed cing dmigs
133a3(khri pa): par mi byed do/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid cing / dmigs
133a4(khri pa): par mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ming ji lta ba bzhin dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin dang /
133a5(khri pa): mngon par 'du byed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par mi byed do/ /gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ji ltar thob par bgyid lags/
133a6(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar khas mi len pa dang / gnas par mi byed pa dang / spong bar mi byed pa dang / mngon par zhen par mi byed cing / ci'ang thob
133a7(khri pa): par mi byed pa de ltar thob par byed do/ /kau shi ka /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos ci yang thob par mi byed par chos thams cad thob par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan
133b1(khri pa): 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang /
133b2(khri pa): 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ni
133b3(khri pa): ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
133b4(khri pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad thob par byed dam/ 'on te thob par mi byed snyam du 'du shes
133b5(khri pa): na| btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing de bzhin du rgyang ring du bgyid pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
133b6(khri pa): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing de bzhin du rgyang
133b7(khri pa): ring du byed pa'i rnam grangs yod de/ rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
134a1(khri pa): gsob bo/ /gsog go /snying po med pa'o/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ya ma brla'o snyam du 'du shes na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha
134a2(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring
134a3(khri pa): du byed pa'i rnam grangs ni de yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha
134a4(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa la glo ba ches na chos gang la glo ba mi ches pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
134a5(khri pa): to| / rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches na gzugs la yid mi ches so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
134a6(khri pa): pa la yid mi ches so/ /mig la yid mi ches pa nas yid gyi bar la yid mi ches so/ /gzugs kyi skye mched la yid mi ches pa nas chos kyi skye mched kyi bar la yid mi ches
134a7(khri pa): so| / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yid mi ches pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la yid mi ches so/ /nang stong pa nyid la yid mi ches pa nas dngos po med
134b1(khri pa): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yid mi ches so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la yid mi ches pa nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la yid mi ches so/ /de
134b2(khri pa): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yid mi ches pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la yid mi ches so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yid
134b3(khri pa): mi ches so/ /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la yid mi ches so/ /rang byang chub la yid
134b4(khri pa): mi ches so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yid mi ches so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid la yid mi ches so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yid mi ches so/ /
134b5(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yid mi ches te/ rab 'byor/ 'on kyang gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches so/ /de bzhin du
134b6(khri pa): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam
134b7(khri pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid
135a1(khri pa): ches pas/ gzugs la yid ches pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
135a2(khri pa): yid ches pa yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yid ches pa yin no/ /de skad ces
135a3(khri pa): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
135a4(khri pa): 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam grangs gang gis na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
135a5(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ gzugs chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
135a6(khri pa): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha
135a7(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ de
135b1(khri pa): bzhin du nang stong pa nyid chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ de bzhin du dran
135b2(khri pa): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ de bzhin
135b3(khri pa): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/
135b4(khri pa): byang chub chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ sangs rgyas chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid lags so/ /gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs sdud par mi
135b5(khri pa): bgyid/ 'phro bar mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdud par mi bgyid/ 'phro bar mi bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs
135b6(khri pa): rgyas kyi bar du sdud par mi bgyid/ 'phro bar mi bgyid lags so/ /gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs tshad mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid pa nas/
135b7(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshad mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid lags so/ /gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs yangs par mi
136a1(khri pa): bgyid/ dog par mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yangs par mi bgyid/ dog par mi
136a2(khri pa): bgyid/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du yangs par mi bgyid/ dog par mi bgyid lags so/ /gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs stobs dang ldan
136a3(khri pa): par mi bgyid/ stobs chung bar mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/ stobs chung bar
136a4(khri pa): mi bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/ stobs chung bar mi bgyid lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des
136a5(khri pa): na| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal
136a6(khri pa): te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
136a7(khri pa): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ 'di snyam du 'du shes te/ shes
136b1(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs chen por bgyid pa'am/ chung ngur bgyis pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chen por bgyid
136b2(khri pa): pa'am/ chung ngur bgyid pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du chen por bgyid pa'am/ chung ngur bgyid pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa'am/
136b3(khri pa): stobs chung ba'i bar du bgyid pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa'am/ stobs chung bar bgyid pa'o snyam
136b4(khri pa): du de lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
136b5(khri pa): na| gang gzugs che bar bgyid pa'am/ chung bar bgyid pa'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du che bar bgyid pa'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu
136b6(khri pa): mthun pa ma lags/ gang gzugs stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa'am/ stobs chung bar bgyid pa'am/ de bzhin du gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
136b7(khri pa): pa stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa'am/ stobs chung bar bgyid pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa'am/ stobs chung bar bgyid pa 'di ni/
137a1(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ma lags/ gang gzugs chen por bgyid pa'am/ chung ngur bgyid pa'am/ de bzhin du gang tshor ba dang /
137a2(khri pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chen por bgyid pa'am/ chung ngur bgyid pa'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa'am/
137a3(khri pa): stobs chub par bgyid pa 'di ni/ de'i dmigs pa chen po lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can rnams la ni byang chub gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad
137a4(khri pa): du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can ma skyes pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs ma skyes pa'i slad du shes rab
137a5(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
137a6(khri pa): ma skyes par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du ma skyes pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes par blta bar bgyi/ sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis
137a7(khri pa): pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
137b1(khri pa): phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/ sems can stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi slad
137b2(khri pa): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
137b3(khri pa): phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ sems can dben
137b4(khri pa): pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben
137b5(khri pa): pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du dben pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa
137b6(khri pa): nyid du blta bar bgyi/ sems can ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
137b7(khri pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar
138a1(khri pa): du ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi slad du/
138a2(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsam
138a3(khri pa): gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi
138a4(khri pa): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ sems can 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa ma mchis
138a5(khri pa): par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
138a6(khri pa): 'jig pa ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa ma mchis par blta bar
138a7(khri pa): bgyi/ sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin
138b1(khri pa): du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
138b2(khri pa): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
138b3(khri pa): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/ sems can stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin
138b4(khri pa): du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par blta bar bgyi
138b5(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par blta bar bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam
138b6(khri pa): grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
138b7(khri pa): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su bsgrags pa de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming
139a1(khri pa): yongs su bsgrags pa ma mdzad la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
139a2(khri pa): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su bsgrags pa ma mdzad lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su
139a3(khri pa): bsgrags pa mdzad pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi ming yongs su bsgrags pa ma mdzad lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe
139a4(khri pa): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gis ngon du 'gro ba yin zhing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi
139a5(khri pa): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin
139a6(khri pa): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ /'di ji snyam du sems/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
139a7(khri pa): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun
139b1(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na
139b2(khri pa): sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mchi ba nas/ shes rab kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
139b3(khri pa): su bsngos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ sbyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
139b4(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi bar du gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
139b5(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
139b6(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ gsol
139b7(khri pa): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sbyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
140a1(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi lags/ de bzhin du ji ltar shes rab kyi bar du gnyis su ma mchis
140a2(khri pa): pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
140a3(khri pa): pa zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
140a4(khri pa): rnam par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so/ /gsol pa/ ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi bar du gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
140a5(khri pa): tshul gyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
140a6(khri pa): par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi bar ni byang chub kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su
140a7(khri pa): med cing gnyis su dbyer med la/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas
140b1(khri pa): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi sngon du 'dren pa yin pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon du 'dren pa yin no/ /dper
140b2(khri pa): na| sa chen po la sa bon gang dag btab pa dag ni tshogs pa rnyed nas skye ste/ sa chen po ni de dag gi rten yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha
140b3(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa la brten nas 'byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi rten yin no/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi 'byung ba nas/
140b4(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'byung zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'byung ngo / /kun dga' bo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa
140b5(khri pa): lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yin te/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po de dag gi yongs su 'dren pa yin zhing /
140b6(khri pa): de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi yongs su 'dren pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
140b7(khri pa): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
141a1(khri pa): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa ni/ yon tan gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan de dag thams
141a2(khri pa): cad ni bka' ma stsal lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
141a3(khri pa): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung lags so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
141a4(khri pa): kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis na/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig
141a5(khri pa): rten na mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes
141a6(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten
141a7(khri pa): du 'byung lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
141b1(khri pa): mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa nas/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa de la ni yon tan de dag 'ba' zhig tu zad par nga mi smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'
141b2(khri pa): bo| rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / thams cad
141b3(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin du gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
141b4(khri pa): glog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
141b5(khri pa): mthong ba'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
141b6(khri pa): par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs par zhugs par rig par bya'o/ /kun
141b7(khri pa): dga' bo/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye
142a1(khri pa): shes mthong ba'i phung po gang yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po nas/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
142a2(khri pa): phung po'i bar de ni/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung
142a3(khri pa): po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po gang yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po nas/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/
142a4(khri pa): rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las sems rnam
142a5(khri pa): par grol zhing / de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi chos la 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
142a6(khri pa): pa 'di yi ger bris nas 'chang zhing / de la'ang me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan sna
142a7(khri pa): tshogs dag gis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mo byed na/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma'i yon tan dang / phan yon ni de dag yin
142b1(khri pa): par smra'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
142b2(khri pa): kyi mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
142b3(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang yi ger bris sam/ yi ger 'drir stsal nas/ me tog dang / ba dan sna tshogs pa dag
142b4(khri pa): gi bar dag dang / rol mo'i sgra dag gis bsti stang du bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa de dag la bdag gis kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa
142b5(khri pa): dang / sba bar bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni nang stong pa nyid la shin tu gnas pa nas/ dngos po med
142b6(khri pa): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la shin tu rnam par gnas pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la klan ka 'tshol bar byed pa 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
142b7(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang klan ka btsal ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ kun dga' bo/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
143a1(khri pa): pa'i gzi brjid kyis yongs su zin pas sus kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi
143a2(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa de'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur/ 'gong bar mi 'gyur/ dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
143a3(khri pa): kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba'am/ 'gong bar 'gyur ba'am/ dngang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/
143a4(khri pa): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa dang / de nyid yi ger bris sam/ yi ger 'drir bcug nas bsti stang
143a5(khri pa): du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de che 'di dang / phyi ma'i yon tan dang / phan yon 'di'ang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ mdza' bshes dang / nye
143a6(khri pa): du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha rnams dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phyogs bcu'i
143a7(khri pa): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
143b1(khri pa): dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa de dag kyang de la
143b2(khri pa): dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
143b3(khri pa): du bcas pa dag gi yid du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
143b4(khri pa): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de'i spobs pa mi chod par 'gyur/ de bzhin du de'i nang
143b5(khri pa): stong pa nyid bsgom pa mi chod par 'gyur/ de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa mi chod par 'gyur/ de bzhin du de'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
143b6(khri pa): bsgom pa mi chod par 'gyur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bsgom pa mi chod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du de'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom
143b7(khri pa): pa mi chod par 'gyur/ de bzhin du de'i gzungs kyi sgo sgom pa mi chod par 'gyur/ de bzhin du de'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa mi chod par 'gyur/ de'i sems can yongs su
144a1(khri pa): smin par bya ba mi chod par 'gyur/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi chod par 'gyur/ de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
144a2(khri pa): du mi chod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan las brgal zhing brtag pa byung ngo cog las nges par 'byung nus par gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang thams cad
144a3(khri pa): mkhyen pa'i sems kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger bris nas/
144a4(khri pa): glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang zhing / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
144a5(khri pa): ba dan sna tshogs dag dang / rol mo'i sgra dag gis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mo byed/ mchod pa byed pa de tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma'i yon tan gyi phan yon de dag yongs su
144a6(khri pa): 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
144a7(khri pa): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag der lhags nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bltas shing kun chub par byas/ phyag byas/ 'dud pa byas nas/ slar 'gro bar sems par
144b1(khri pa): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / de bzhin du
144b2(khri pa): tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / mi che ba dang /
144b3(khri pa): chung che dang / tshad med che dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang der lhags nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
144b4(khri pa): phyin pa 'di bltas shing bzung la/ kun chub par byas/ phyag byas/ 'dud pa byas nas slar 'dod bar sems par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gtsang ma gang yin pa/ 'di lta ste/ mi che ba
144b5(khri pa): dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang de nyid du lhags nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bltas shing phyag 'tshal
144b6(khri pa): ba'i bar du byas nas slar 'dong bar sems par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
144b7(khri pa): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas/ 'bras bu che ba'i bar gyi lha gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
145a1(khri pa): dag par zhugs pa dag dang / gnas gtsang ma gang dag yin pa dag dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye
145a2(khri pa): chen po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci gang yin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang /
145a3(khri pa): bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lhags pa de dag la bdag gis de ltar chos kyi sbyin pa byin par gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /kun dga'
145a4(khri pa): bo/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha 'khod pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de nyid du lhags
145a5(khri pa): nas| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bltas shing bzung / bcangs/ bklags/ kun chub par byas/ phyag 'tshal 'dud pa byas nas/ slar 'dong bar sems par 'gyur la /
145a6(khri pa): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la'ang rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
145a7(khri pa): dag na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams 'khod pa dag der lhags nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bltas pa nas phyag bya ba'i bar du
145b1(khri pa): byas nas/ slar 'dong bar sems par 'gyur la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la'ang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ las kyi rnam par smin pa
145b2(khri pa): ma gtogs pa de la glags blta ba sus kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ de'ang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i tshe 'di'i yon tan dang / phan yon yongs su 'dzin par
145b3(khri pa): 'gyur ba yin no/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i lha gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag
145b4(khri pa): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la'ang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir 'ong bar sems par 'gyur ro/ /de
145b5(khri pa): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar lha de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin zhing / sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / skyob pa dang / sems can
145b6(khri pa): rnams yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya bar gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
145b7(khri pa): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'dir mchis pa nas/ 'og min gyi bar
146a1(khri pa): gyi lha rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang dag par blta ba dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mchod pa bgyi
146a2(khri pa): ba dang / bkur sti bgyi ba'i slad du mchis par ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka'
146a3(khri pa): stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs der snang ba rgya chen po mthong na/ nges par der lha
146a4(khri pa): dbang che bar grags pa/ mthu che ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang dag par blta ba dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
146a5(khri pa): mchod pa bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir lhags par shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la mi ma yin pa'i dri rgya chen po mnam
146a6(khri pa): na| nges par nger lha mthu che ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la blta ba dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang /
146a7(khri pa): mchod pa bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir 'dir lhags par shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de rtag tu kun tu spyod pa gtsang mar byas nas/
146b1(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la cho ga bzhin du mchod pa byed na/ de'i kun tu spyod pa gtsang ma des lha mang po dag lhags nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang dag par bltas
146b2(khri pa): shing bzung / kun chub par byas/ bcangs/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas pas yi rangs par 'gyur ro/ /lha dbang chung bar grags pa gang dag phyogs de na 'khod
146b3(khri pa): pa de dag kyang lha mthu che ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang / bla mar gyur pa nyid mi bzod pas/ phyogs de nas 'dong bar sems par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar lha dbang
146b4(khri pa): che bar grags pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba 'ong bar bya bar sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i mos pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /de'i nyen kor du gtsang sbra mi
146b5(khri pa): byed pa'i bag spyad par mi bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i don dus phyogs de bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya/ me
146b6(khri pa): tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ pog phor rnams nas bdug par bya/ dar gyi lda ldi gtsang ma bre bar bya/ bla re sna tshogs bzang po bre bar bya/ sa phyogs de rnam pa du mas legs
146b7(khri pa): par brgyan par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bkur sti byed cing / mchod pa byed pa'i lus
147a1(khri pa): ngal bar mi 'gyur/ lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / lus yang ba nyid dang / lus gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / sems gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /yang
147a2(khri pa): de 'di ltar 'du shes par 'gyur te/ nyal ba na rmi lam sdig pa can dag mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /des rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
147a3(khri pa): sangs rgyas sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gsal bar byas pa/ sku gser gyi mdog can dge slong gi dge
147a4(khri pa): 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de las kyang /
147a5(khri pa): 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi chos thos par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi don
147a6(khri pa): rnam par dbye ba thos par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi don rnam par dbye ba thos par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang
147a7(khri pa): chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de
147b1(khri pa): bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag mang po dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar
147b2(khri pa): yongs su thob par bya'o/ /sems can rnams ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su dag par bya'o/ /bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar yongs su
147b3(khri pa): gdul bar bya'o zhes 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pa byed pa'ang shes shing mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gi sgra
147b4(khri pa): thos par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams kyi bar dag nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gi sgra thos
147b5(khri pa): par 'gyur te/ kye 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag
147b6(khri pa): 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to zhes thos par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du shar phyogs
147b7(khri pa): na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las
148a1(khri pa): byas pa bye ba phrag 'bum dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / de bzhin
148a2(khri pa): gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
148a3(khri pa): dang | rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs pa dag gis bkur sti byed pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar
148a4(khri pa): bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des rmi lam bzang po de lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bde ba kho nar sad par 'gyur/ de'i lus la gzi byin 'jug par 'gyur/
148a5(khri pa): de'i lus yang ba nyid du shes par 'gyur/ de zas la brkam pa nyid du mi 'gyur/ chos gos la brkam pa nyid du ma yin/ na ba'i gso sman dang / yo byad la brkam pa nyid du mi 'gyur/
148a6(khri pa): de zas kyi 'du shes chung ba nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ de yo byad kyi 'du shes chung ba nyid du 'gyur te/ dper na/ dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa 'dod pa nas/ ting nge 'dzin
148a7(khri pa): las langs pa zas la brkam pa'i shas che ba ma yin pa de bzhin du zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ gang la la zhig gis lus la mi ma yin
148b1(khri pa): pa rnams gzi byin 'jug par byed na/ de ni de bzhin du 'gyur te/ des na de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
148b2(khri pa): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag lus la gzi
148b3(khri pa): byin nye bar bsgrub par 'gyur bas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ba dan gyi bar dag dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis bkur sti bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mo bya/ mchod pa bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
148b4(khri pa): tu phyin pa khri pa las/ phan yon gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa
148b5(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mchis pa lags/ de yun ji
148b6(khri pa): srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ des de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags/ des sbyin pa'i pha rol
148b7(khri pa): tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
149a1(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ji srid cig nas spyad pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la don dang tshul las mos par 'gyur lags
149a2(khri pa): sam| de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149a3(khri pa): c hen po de ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med grangs med
149a4(khri pa): tshad med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byas nas 'dir 'ong ba dag yin/ 'dir skyes shing byung ba dag yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bskal pa
149a5(khri pa): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gzhal du med cing / grangs med tshad med pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /des sems dang po
149a6(khri pa): bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'ongs pa yin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
149a7(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'ongs pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa
149b1(khri pa): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med tshad med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dir 'ongs pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149b2(khri pa): chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ngam thos na bdag gis ni ston pa mthong ngo zhes sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
149b3(khri pa): po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la'ang don dang tshig las mtshan ma med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
149b4(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan pa po dang / lta ba po rnams kyi ston pa
149b5(khri pa): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni nyan pa po dang / lta ba po med do/ /rab
149b6(khri pa): 'byor| chos bems po nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi thos mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi thos mi mthong ngo / /
149b7(khri pa): de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi
150a1(khri pa): thos mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/ nang stong pa nyid mi thos mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos bems po nyid kyi phyir dngos po med
150a2(khri pa): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi thos mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi thos mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi
150a3(khri pa): phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi thos mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
150a4(khri pa): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du mi thos mi mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ chos bems po nyid kyi phyir byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyang mi thos mi mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
150a5(khri pa): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa mos par dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
150a6(khri pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar
150a7(khri pa): gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba yin la/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba yin pa'i phyir
150b1(khri pa): ro| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
150b2(khri pa): pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha
150b3(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
