180b4(khri pa): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yod pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
180b5(khri pa): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yod pas de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid bstan pa yod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid bstan pa yod pa dang / de bzhin
180b6(khri pa): du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bstan pa yod pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bstan pa yod pa dang / gong ma bzhin du sbyar
180b7(khri pa): te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bstan pa yod de/ de la bslabs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na
181a1(khri pa): yod pa'i phyir te/ des na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
181a2(khri pa): la ni skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'i chos gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir
181a3(khri pa): zhe na/ 'di ltar chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba de med pa'i
181a4(khri pa): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ lung bstan du yod pa'am/ lung bstan du med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las
181a5(khri pa): 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na rin po che'i pha
181a6(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su med pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar
181a7(khri pa): gang dag gis rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa gos par 'gyur ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
181b1(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ de ltar yang kun tu mi 'dzin cing / de ltar yang rnam par rtog par mi byed la/ de ltar yang spros par mi byed na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
181b2(khri pa): la spyod pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur sti dang / ri mo dang / mchod pa byed du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / sangs
181b3(khri pa): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba na/ sems can 'bum dag kyang yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/
181b4(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston par byed pa'am/ mi ston par byed pa'am/ 'dzin par byed pa'am/ sbyin par byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa'am/ 'gag par
181b5(khri pa): byed pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa'am/ 'grib pa'am/ 'phel bar byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs
181b6(khri pa): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dod pa'i khams su 'jog par
181b7(khri pa): byed pa ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams su 'jog par byed pa ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/
182a1(khri pa): gzugs med pa'i khams su 'jog par byed pa ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ tshul
182a2(khri pa): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ brtson
182a3(khri pa): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no//
182a4(khri pa): nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma
182a5(khri pa): yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
182a6(khri pa): bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ rang byang chub sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems
182a7(khri pa): dpa'i skyon med pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/ /rab
182b1(khri pa): 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/
182b2(khri pa): 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma
182b3(khri pa): yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ yang shes rab kyi pha rol
182b4(khri pa): tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
182b5(khri pa): pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /
182b6(khri pa): yang chos kyi dbyings de ni brjed ngas pa med pa dang / yongs su mi nyams par 'gyur bar byed pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing
182b7(khri pa): ga zha'i sgra ring zhes bton nas/ lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gtor te/ tshig 'di skad ces a la la dzam+bu gling du chos kyi 'khor
183a1(khri pa): lo lan gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo / /zhes 'jer to/ /der lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de
183a2(khri pa): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
183a3(khri pa): ba 'di ni dang po ma yin no/ /gnyis pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang bskor bar bya ba'i phyir ram/ ldog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma
183a4(khri pa): yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
183a5(khri pa): chos gang yang bskor bar bgyi ba'am/ ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de dag gang lags/ bcom
183a6(khri pa): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni/
183a7(khri pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa
183b1(khri pa): nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
183b2(khri pa): kyis stong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
183b3(khri pa): bcus stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong / so so'i skye bo ni so so'i skye bos stong / rgyun du zhugs
183b4(khri pa): pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi
183b5(khri pa): 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong / rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i
183b6(khri pa): ngo bo nyid kyis stong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
183b7(khri pa): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags te/ chos thams cad
184a1(khri pa): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'ang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
184a2(khri pa): brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyid kyang skor bar bgyid pa'am/ ldog par
184a3(khri pa): bgyid pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis te/ chos gang gis kyang chos yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'am/ skor bar bgyid pa ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar
184a4(khri pa): stong pa nyid la chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar chos
184a5(khri pa): thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags/ mtshan
184a6(khri pa): ma ma mchis pa ni chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa ni chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa
184a7(khri pa): ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pa dang / 'chad pa dang / 'dogs pa dang / 'jog pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / rnam par
184b1(khri pa): 'grel ba dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / 'jug par bgyid pa dang / 'chad par bgyid pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa yongs su dag pa lags so/ /shes
184b2(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa 'di ni sus kyang bshad pa ma mchis la bstan pa'ang ma mchis te/ sus kyang dris pa'ang ma mchis/ sus kyang mngon sum du bgyid pa'ang ma
184b3(khri pa): mchis lags so/ /de la ni gang yang mya ngan las 'das pa ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la ni yon gnas su bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
184b4(khri pa): tu phyin pa khri pa las/ byed pa po dang / byed pa po med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di
184b5(khri pa): skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
184b6(khri pa): bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
184b7(khri pa): stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha'
185a1(khri pa): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzi ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
185a2(khri pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
185a3(khri pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming med pa dang / lus med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/
185a4(khri pa): dbugs dbyung ba dang / rdub pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rtog pa
185a5(khri pa): dang / dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du
185a6(khri pa): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchi ba ma mchis pa lags
185a7(khri pa): so| |bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
185b1(khri pa): cad ni gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi pas pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gtan zad cing byang ba'i phyir
185b2(khri pa): ro| |btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /
185b3(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha
185b4(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad bems po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin
185b5(khri pa): pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis
185b6(khri pa): pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rmi
185b7(khri pa): lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brag ca lta bu lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ sgra dang rna ba dmigs su med
186a1(khri pa): pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor lta bu lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ mi long dang bzhin dmigs su med
186a2(khri pa): pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa
186a3(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol
186a4(khri pa): tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha
186a5(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin
186a6(khri pa): pa 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gos pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma
186a7(khri pa): mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma
186b1(khri pa): mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa
186b2(khri pa): lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so/ /bka' stsal
186b3(khri pa): pa| chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/
186b4(khri pa): chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma dmigs
186b5(khri pa): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
186b6(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
186b7(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol
187a1(khri pa): tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ kun tu rtog pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
187a2(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ sems can yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa
187a3(khri pa): 'di ni spang du ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha'
187a4(khri pa): gnyis dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad
187a5(khri pa): pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'brel ba med pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nag nog ma mchis pa lags so/ /
187a6(khri pa): bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam
187a7(khri pa): par mi rtog pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma
187b1(khri pa): mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa
187b2(khri pa): lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/
187b3(khri pa): chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skyo ba med
187b4(khri pa): pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /
187b5(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha
187b6(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ldog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang
187b7(khri pa): stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka'
188a1(khri pa): stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka'
188a2(khri pa): stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal
188a3(khri pa): pa| stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos
188a4(khri pa): thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa
188a5(khri pa): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas
188a6(khri pa): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas
188a7(khri pa): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ mtha'
188b1(khri pa): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa /
188b2(khri pa): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba ma mchis pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka'
188b3(khri pa): stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/
188b4(khri pa): 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ nang dang phyi'i
188b5(khri pa): chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
188b6(khri pa): pa nyid kyi chos rnams dben pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dngos po
188b7(khri pa): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ lus
189a1(khri pa): dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba lags so/ /
189a2(khri pa): bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rdzu
189a3(khri pa): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med
189a4(khri pa): pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
189a5(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu
189a6(khri pa): phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol
189a7(khri pa): tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa
189b1(khri pa): 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /
189b2(khri pa): bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa
189b3(khri pa): brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
189b4(khri pa): par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir
189b5(khri pa): ro| |btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom
189b6(khri pa): ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang / bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu
189b7(khri pa): phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan lags so/ /
190a1(khri pa): bka' stsal pa/ rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lags so/
190a2(khri pa): bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos
190a3(khri pa): thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyis rdzi ba med
190a4(khri pa): pa'i phyir dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa de la zhum pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa lags so/ /bka'
190a5(khri pa): stsal pa/ shes pa thams cad la chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so/ /bka' stsal
190a6(khri pa): pa| sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lags
190a7(khri pa): so| |bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
190b1(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ skad thams cad du de bzhin du gsung ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang
190b2(khri pa): byung lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags
190b3(khri pa): so| |bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na
190b4(khri pa): 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / rgya spos dang / spri ka dang / a ka ru nag
190b5(khri pa): po'i phye ma dag 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ phyogs gcig tu
190b6(khri pa): 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
190b7(khri pa): 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ de skad
191a1(khri pa): skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin zhes zer na/ ci khyed de la yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
191a2(khri pa): nam mkha' mtshan nyid lags so zhes yang dag par mi smra lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha' ni 'dus ma bgyis lags pa'i
191a3(khri pa): slad du mtshan nyid gang dang yang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags te/ ma mchis shing dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
191a4(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha dag /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
191a5(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid yin te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
191a6(khri pa): du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
191a7(khri pa): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mtshan nyid gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ chos rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chags
191b1(khri pa): pa ma mchis pa gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid gang la gnas nas/ chags pa thams cad las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
191b2(khri pa): pa zab mo 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ni zab lags so/ /btsun pa bcom
191b3(khri pa): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ gang la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi sku tshe rabs dag tu byang chub sems dpar gyur pas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa lnga brnyes
191b4(khri pa): shing / sku tshe 'di la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
191b5(khri pa): k yang mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ngo
191b6(khri pa): mtshar lags so/ /chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid thugs
191b7(khri pa): su chud pa dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
192a1(khri pa): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni stong
192a2(khri pa): pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin no/ /lha dag /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /lha dag /de
192a3(khri pa): bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
192a4(khri pa): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /lha dag /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
192a5(khri pa): pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi don du ming dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs par mdzad
192a6(khri pa): de| lha dag / de dag don dam par ni ma yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dkrug par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lha dang
192a7(khri pa): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang de'i mtshan nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lha dag /de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes/ mtshan nyid kyis
192b1(khri pa): mtshan nyid med pa'ang rab tu mi shes/ mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes/ mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid med pa'ang rab tu mi shes te/ lha dag /de ltar na
192b2(khri pa): mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / de dag gnyis ka gang gis shes par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes par 'gyur ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro/ /lha
192b3(khri pa): dag / mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ rnam par shes
192b4(khri pa): pas mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos
192b5(khri pa): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis
192b6(khri pa): mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /mtshan nyid de dag ni mi rnams sam/ mi ma yin pa rnams sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sam/ zag pa med pa rnams
192b7(khri pa): sam/ 'jig rten pa rnams sam/ 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams sam/ 'dus byas rnams sam/ 'dus ma byas rnams kyang ma yin no/ /yang lha dag /gang la la zhig 'di
193a1(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa nas/ rnam pa thams cad
193a2(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag la
193a3(khri pa): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha dag /gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
193a4(khri pa): so| |de bzhin du tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/ 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/ 'du byed rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par shes pa ni so
193a5(khri pa): sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su
193a6(khri pa): gtong ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs par mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gdung ba
193a7(khri pa): med pa'i mtshan nyid/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rdzi ba med pa'i mtshan nyid/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
193b1(khri pa): tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i mtshan nyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas
193b2(khri pa): mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni
193b3(khri pa): nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni nges
193b4(khri pa): par 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni rnam par grol
193b5(khri pa): ba'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni 'dzin pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni don du gnyer ba med pa'i mtshan nyid/ btang
193b6(khri pa): snyoms ni 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni mi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/
193b7(khri pa): mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni zhum pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ byams pa chen po ni skyob pa'i mtshan nyid/ snying rje chen po ni snying brtse ba'i mtshan nyid/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
194a1(khri pa): bco brgyad ni zil gyis mi non pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rnam
194a2(khri pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin la sgrib pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
194a3(khri pa): rgyas so/ /lha dag /de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas des na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
194a4(khri pa): chags pa med par gzigs pa zhes bya'o/ / //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe
194a5(khri pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
194a6(khri pa): bskyed pa dang / ston par byed pa yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nye bar brten nas gnas so/ /nye bar brten nas kyang shes
194a7(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos de la bkur sti mdzad/ bla mar mdzad/ ri mor mdzad/ mchod pa mdzad de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na dam pa'i chos shes rab kyi pha rol
194b1(khri pa): tu phyin pa 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa bkur sti mdzad/ bla mar mdzad/ ri mor mdzad/ mchod pa mdzad pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
194b2(khri pa): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
194b3(khri pa): 'di la byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa ni byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba'o zhes yang dag par smra
194b4(khri pa): bas smras na/ de ni byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar yang dag par smra bas smras pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa
194b5(khri pa): tshor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa gang gis byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lam gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
194b6(khri pa): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa de dang / lam de la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyun kho nar bkur sti mdzad/ bla mar mdzad/ ri mor mdzad/ mchod pa
194b7(khri pa): mdzad cing / de bzhin du rjes su 'dzin cing / rjes su skor bar mdzad pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba yin par blta
195a1(khri pa): bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byed pa po med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas dam pa'i chos byas pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
195a2(khri pa): rgyas so/ /de bzhin du lus med pa'i phyir chos thams cad byas pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
195a3(khri pa): la brten nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab
195a4(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la byas pa med par mkhyen pa
195a5(khri pa): 'jug cing rang bzhin dang brdas ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten
195a6(khri pa): rnams ston par byed pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom
195a7(khri pa): ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du chos thams cad ni shes pa med pa dang / mig med pa'o zhes bka' stsal lags na/ 'o na ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha
195b1(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams ston par bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
195b2(khri pa): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad shes pa med pa dang mig med pa'o zhes ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na
195b3(khri pa): chos thams cad shes pa med pa dang / mig med pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni brten pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
195b4(khri pa): des na chos thams cad shes pa med pa dang / mig med pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'jig
195b5(khri pa): rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/ /de'ang gzugs ma mthong ba'i phyir ston par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
195b6(khri pa): shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ston par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mthong ba'i phyir ston par byed pa
195b7(khri pa): yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun
196a1(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na gzugs ma mthong ba'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin du ji ltar
196a2(khri pa): na tshor ba dang / ji ltar na 'du shes dang / ji ltar na 'du byed rnams dang / ji ltar na rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par bgyid
196a3(khri pa): pa lags/ de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mthong ba'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par
196a4(khri pa): bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung na/ de ltar na gzugs ma mthong
196a5(khri pa): ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba la dmigs pa dang / 'du shes la dmigs pa dang / 'du byed rnams la
196a6(khri pa): dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung na/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston
196a7(khri pa): par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung na/ de ltar na
196b1(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de
196b2(khri pa): bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten rnams la phung po
196b3(khri pa): lnga po stong ngo zhes rjod par byed do/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad stong ngo zhes rjod do/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la dge ba
196b4(khri pa): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi stong ngo zhes rjod do/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten
196b5(khri pa): rnams la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang / lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba stong ngo zhes rjod do/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten
196b6(khri pa): rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du stong ngo zhes rjod do/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes rjod do//
196b7(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes rjod do/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi stong ngo zhes rjod do/
197a1(khri pa): de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du stong ngo zhes rjod do/ /'jig rten
197a2(khri pa): rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong ngo zhes rjod de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'jig
197a3(khri pa): rten rnams la ston pa byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
197a4(khri pa): 'di nyid la brten nas 'jig rten rnams la phung po lnga stong ngo zhes ston te/ 'jig rten yang stong ngo khong du chud cing rig la/ kun du shes shing 'jig rten dag la'ang
197a5(khri pa): de kho na bzhin du rjod par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la ston
197a6(khri pa): par byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
197a7(khri pa): 'jig rten stong ngo zhes ston par byed do/ /'jig rten stong par ston pa de gang zhe na/ phung po lnga'i 'jig rten de stong par ston to/ /de bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis kyi
197b1(khri pa): 'jig rten de stong par ston to/ /de bzhin du khams bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten de stong par ston to/ /de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
197b2(khri pa): gyi 'jig rten de stong par ston par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams ston par
197b3(khri pa): byod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten
197b4(khri pa): bsam gyis mi khyab par ston par byed do/ /'jig rten gang zhig bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco
197b5(khri pa): brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston to/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston te/ rab
197b6(khri pa): 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
197b7(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhes
198a1(khri pa): bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba nas/ stong zhes bya ba'i bar du ston pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga nas/ rnam pa thams
198a2(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin du phung po lnga nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar ston te/
198a3(khri pa): rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
198a4(khri pa): y ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di la 'jig rten du 'du shes pa med
198a5(khri pa): pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jig rten du 'du shes pa med par 'jig rten gyi 'du shes ston par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar chos gang dag
198a6(khri pa): gis 'jig rten 'dir 'du shes pa'am/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'du shes par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
198a7(khri pa): dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad
198b1(khri pa): pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mdzad pa dpag
198b2(khri pa): tu ma mchis pas nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha
198b3(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin zhing / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mdzad pa gzhal
198b4(khri pa): du med pa dang / mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdzad pa chen po dang / mdzad
198b5(khri pa): pa mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar gyis nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa
198b6(khri pa): chen po ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad bskyes par bya ba'i don dang / yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar
198b7(khri pa): gnas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bsam gyis
199a1(khri pa): mi khyab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad
199a2(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid yin te/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
199a3(khri pa): rnams kyi mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdzad pa gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas
199a4(khri pa): pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'gro ba lnga po dag na/ sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa la gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa
199a5(khri pa): nyid dam/ rang byung nyid dam/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam pa'am/ gzhal bar nus pa'i sems can ni 'ga' yang med la/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
199a6(khri pa): pa'i mthu yin te/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
199a7(khri pa): kyi mdzad pa gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dpag tu med pas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/
199b1(khri pa): rab 'byor/ dpag tu med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen
199b2(khri pa): pa nyid yin te/ rab 'byor/ 'gro ba lnga po dag na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa la/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
199b3(khri pa): rnams dang mnyam pa'i sems can ni 'ga' yang med na/ lhag pa lta ga la yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
199b4(khri pa): de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rab tu phye ba yin te/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
199b5(khri pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa dpag tu med pa nas/ mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar gyis nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /de skad ces
199b6(khri pa): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
199b7(khri pa): rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu
200a1(khri pa): ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /
200a2(khri pa): ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
200a3(khri pa): nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni gzhal du med pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang /
200a4(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni dpag tu med pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par
200a5(khri pa): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang
200a6(khri pa): mnyam pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
200a7(khri pa): yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin
200b1(khri pa): no| |de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang /
200b2(khri pa): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
200b3(khri pa): ba'i bar du yin no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te/ de dag la ni sems dang sems las
200b4(khri pa): byung ba'i chos rnams med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/ /rab 'byor/
200b5(khri pa): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/ /
200b6(khri pa): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/ /de skad
200b7(khri pa): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du/ gzugs bsam
201a1(khri pa): gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du lags te ma mchis
201a2(khri pa): pa lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / dpag
201a3(khri pa): tu ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du lags te ma mchis pa lags/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam
201a4(khri pa): gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du lags te ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs la'ang
201a5(khri pa): tshad med de/ de'i phyir gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
201a6(khri pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang tshad med de/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du
201a7(khri pa): yin te med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang tshad med de/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam
201b1(khri pa): gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/ /gsol pa/ ci'i slad du gzugs tshad ma mchis pa lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
201b2(khri pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad ma mchis pa lags/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad ma mchis pa lags/
201b3(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te/ de'i phyir gzugs la tshad
201b4(khri pa): med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar
201b5(khri pa): du yin te/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la tshad med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
201b6(khri pa): bar du gang yin pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod snyam mam/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa
201b7(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das/ ma mchis lags so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin
202a1(khri pa): no| |rab 'byor/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du
202a2(khri pa): med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam pa dang bral ba/ gzhal
202a3(khri pa): du med pa/ gzhal ba dang bral ba/ dpag tu med pa/ dpag pa dang bral ba/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bral ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ bsam
202a4(khri pa): gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bla dwags yin no/ /gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba de ni gzhal du med pa'i tshig bla dwags yin no/ /dpag tu
202a5(khri pa): med pa zhes bya ba de ni dpag tu med pa'i tshig bla dwags yin te/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni bsam
202a6(khri pa): gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin no/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin
202a7(khri pa): no| |rab 'byor/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dag yin te/ de dag kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma
202b1(khri pa): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba'am/ bgrang bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin du dpag tu med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams
202b2(khri pa): yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na dge
202b3(khri pa): slong lnga brgya ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma nyis brgya ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam grol lo/ /dge bsnyen drug
202b4(khri pa): brgya dang / dge bsnyen ma sum brgya ni/ chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyis stong gis ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag kyang bskal
202b5(khri pa): pa bzang po 'di nyid la lung bstan to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ yon tan gyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa
202b6(khri pa): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags shing / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202b7(khri pa): phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / bgyi ba dpag tu
203a1(khri pa): ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bgyi bas nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
203a2(khri pa): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa nas shes
203a3(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyi bya bas nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir pha rol tu
203a4(khri pa): phyin pa lnga 'dus pa dang / nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi 'dus pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/
203a5(khri pa): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du 'dus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus pa dang / rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi
203a6(khri pa): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'dus pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul gyi mi la spyod pa thob pa'i rgyal po'i dgos pa
203a7(khri pa): dang | rgyal po'i bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni bka' la gtogs pa'i mi la yod cing / blon po chen po'i mi la yod pa yin te/ rgyal po ni bya ba de dag la snying las chung ba
203b1(khri pa): dang / khur por ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/ yang dag par rdzogs
203b2(khri pa): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed pa yin no/ /
203b3(khri pa): rab 'byor/ de lta bas na rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam
203b4(khri pa): pa dang mnyam par bya ba'i bar dang / gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
203b5(khri pa): rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs
203b6(khri pa): su 'dzin pa med cing / mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di
203b7(khri pa): skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing / mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par
204a1(khri pa): nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / ji ltar na 'du shes dang / ji ltar na 'du byed rnams dang / ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma
204a2(khri pa): mchis shing / mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing / mngon par
204a3(khri pa): zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ ci
204a4(khri pa): khyod kyis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/ mngon par zhen par bya ba'i gzugs de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom
204a5(khri pa): ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci khyod kyis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/ mngon par zhen
204a6(khri pa): par bya ba'i tshor ba de dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed de dag dang / rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so//
204a7(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci khyod kyis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/ mngon par zhen par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad
204b1(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de'ang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ /
204b2(khri pa): legs so/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ ngas kyang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/ mngon par zhen par bya ba de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /
204b3(khri pa): de bzhin du ngas kyang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/ mngon par zhen par bya ba'i tshor ba de dang / 'du shes de dang / 'du byed de dag dang / rnam par shes pa de
204b4(khri pa): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ngas kyang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/ mngon par zhen par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
204b5(khri pa): pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs la yongs su gzung bar mi bya/ mngon
204b6(khri pa): par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su gzung bar mi bya/ mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na
204b7(khri pa): spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka'
205a1(khri pa): ste| brtag par mi nus shing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags la/ zhi ba zhi ba mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pas rig par bgyi ba lags so/ /btsun pa
205a2(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mos par gyur pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par
205a3(khri pa): bgyi ba bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskrun pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dag lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe stong gsum gyi stong
205a4(khri pa): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur cing / de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du
205a5(khri pa): zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dag tu gyur kyang de dag gi shes pa gang lags pa dang / spong ba gang lags pa bas
205a6(khri pa): ni gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la nyin gcig tsam zhig bzod pa'am/ 'dod pa'am/ 'jal ba'am/ nye bar rtog par bgyid na/ de'i shes pa dang / spong
205a7(khri pa): ba de nyid ches mang ba lags kyi/ snga ma dad pas rjes su 'brang ba nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bar de dag gi shes pa dang / spong ba ni ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dad
205b1(khri pa): pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi shes pa dang / spong ba gang lags pa dang / de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spong ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye
205b2(khri pa): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha dag /legs
205b3(khri pa): so| |legs so/ /de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha dag /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing thos nas kyang mos
205b4(khri pa): par 'gyur la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/ de bzhin du 'chang zhing ston pa nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su tshul bzhin du yid
205b5(khri pa): la byed pa'i bar du byed na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis chos myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar nga smra'i/ nyan thos kyi
205b6(khri pa): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams sam/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan dag la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par spyod pas ni ma
205b7(khri pa): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dag/ 'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams nas/ dgra bcom pa'i bar dag dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos gang la bslab par bya ba dang / byang
206a1(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos gang la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
206a2(khri pa): pa'i yang dag phul gyi chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag gis 'di skad
206a3(khri pa): ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
206a4(khri pa): 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
206a5(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs nas/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams
206a6(khri pa): dang | phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su nges par 'byung lags so/ /'di la
206a7(khri pa): bslabs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ phung po'i lhag ma med
206b1(khri pa): ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni bri ba'am/ gang bar mngon pa ma mchis lags so/ /zhes ched du
206b2(khri pa): brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/
206b3(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo / /de dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu rdzu 'phrul gyis dong nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /de
206b4(khri pa): la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do/ /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
206b5(khri pa): la| tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos
206b6(khri pa): nas| thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing gong du'ang yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par bgyid pa nas/ rtag tu tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du
206b7(khri pa): bgyid pa zhig lags na/ de gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
207a1(khri pa): to| |rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing /
207a2(khri pa): gong du'ang yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rtag tu tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa dang / gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
207a3(khri pa): phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pa'i phyi bzhin du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ dper na/ ba drus ma be'u sar pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
207a4(khri pa): dpa'i theg pa pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing / gong du'ang yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun
207a5(khri pa): chub par byed pa dang / rtag tu tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni mi rnams kyi nang kho na nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams kyi
207a6(khri pa): nang du skyes pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag des sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
207a7(khri pa): thos nas/ bzung zhing bcangs la/ kun chub par byas pa nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa yin zhing / gong du'ang yi ger bris te/ glegs bam du chud par byas nas/
207b1(khri pa): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bkur stir byas shing / de bzhin du btsun par
207b2(khri pa): byas| ri mor byas te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs nas/ mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
207b3(khri pa): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
207b4(khri pa): dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/ de nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu mos
207b5(khri pa): par bgyid la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / de bzhin du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba lta mchis lags
207b6(khri pa): sam| de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang
207b7(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ de de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos
208a1(khri pa): nas thos ma thag tu mos par byed la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / de bzhin du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par
208a2(khri pa): byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'ang yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag des sangs rgyas kyi zhing
208a3(khri pa): de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/ de bzhin du bzung zhing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa nas/ tshul bzhin
208a4(khri pa): du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa yin te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
208a5(khri pa): gang zag gang gis dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing / tshul bzhin du yid las byed pa'i bar du byas pa de/ de tshun chad las mi dge ba
208a6(khri pa): bsags pa zad par byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa'i rgyus mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam
208a7(khri pa): par skyes pa de'ang yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dga' ldan gyi gnas su
208b1(khri pa): skyes pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dris shing yongs su zhus pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
208b2(khri pa): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/ chos gsal bar ston pa de la ma dris shing yongs su ma zhus pa 'dir skyes
208b3(khri pa): pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la som nyi nyid du gyur cing / the tshom nyid du gyur te/ sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyur
208b4(khri pa): ro| |de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
208b5(khri pa): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi zab mo 'di thos la/ chos gsal bar ston pa de la ma dris shing yongs su ma zhus pa 'dir skyes
208b6(khri pa): pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ som nyi nyid du gyur cing / the tshom nyid du gyur te/ sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
208b7(khri pa): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu nang stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i
209a1(khri pa): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 'di thos la/ chos gsal bar ston pa de la ma dris shing yongs su ma zhus pa 'dir skyes pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
209a2(khri pa): mo 'di thos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la som nyi nyid du gyur cing / the tshom nyid du gyur te/ sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
209a3(khri pa): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
209a4(khri pa): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
209a5(khri pa): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du thos la/ chos gsal bar ston
209a6(khri pa): pa de la ma dris shing yongs su ma zhus pa 'dir skyes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la som nyi nyid du
209a7(khri pa): gyur cing / yid rtul ba nyid dang / the tshom nyid du gyur te/ sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyur ro// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po nyi shu
209b1(khri pa): gcig pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma
209b2(khri pa): gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ nyi ma lngar yang nyams su ma blangs shing ma bsgoms pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/
209b3(khri pa): nyi ma lngar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'phrogs bar mi 'gyur gyi/ de'i 'og tu ni the tshom gyis 'phrogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ nan tan
209b4(khri pa): snying por mi byed pa'i gang zag ni chos de dag ma bsgoms shing nan tan ma byas pas de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni theg pa
209b5(khri pa): la zhugs nas ring po ma lon pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin pa des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
209b6(khri pa): phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma bris shing ma bzung la/ ma bcangs te/ kun tu chub bar ma byas pa dang / ma bklags pa dang / kha ton du ma byas pa dang / lung ma mnos pa dang / tshul bzhin
209b7(khri pa): du yid la ma byas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang ma bslabs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
210a1(khri pa): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs pa yin pa dang / de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs pa
210a2(khri pa): nas| phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslabs pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs
210a3(khri pa): pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam rnams
210a4(khri pa): dang | rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar
210a5(khri pa): la ma bslabs par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger mi 'dri zhing / yi ger 'drir
210a6(khri pa): mi 'jug pa dang / mi 'dzin pa dang / mi 'chad ba dang / kun chub par mi byed pa dang / mi klog pa dang / kha ton du mi byed pa dang / lung mi nod pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa
210a7(khri pa): de| ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang nyams su mi len la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis sems can la'ang phan mi 'dogs te/ rnam pa thams
210b1(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug na/ de ni sa gnyis po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir
210b2(khri pa): zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma bris shing / yi ger 'drir ma bcug /ma bzung ma bcangs/ kun chub par ma byas/ ma bklags/ kha ton du ma
210b3(khri pa): byas/ lung ma mnos/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji skad bstan pa la nan tan du ma byas pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ dper na/ rgya mtsho'i
210b4(khri pa): gru'am/ gru bo che chag cing zhig na/ de na mi gang dag 'tsho bar 'dod pa dag shing leb dag gam/ shing dag gam/ rkyal pa dag gam/ mi ro dag la mi 'ju zhing / 'dzin par mi byed pa de dag
210b5(khri pa): ni| rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ dper na rgya mtsho'i gru'am/ gru bo che chag cing zhig na/ de na mi gang dag 'tsho bar 'dod pa
210b6(khri pa): dag shing leb dag gam/ shing dag gam/ rgyal ba dag gam/ mi ro dag la 'ju zhing 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni bde ba dang / bde legs su ma smas ma nyams par rgya mtsho'i 'gram du
210b7(khri pa): gnas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam
211a1(khri pa): dang ldan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger mi 'dri zhing / yi ger 'drir mi 'jug pa dang / mi 'dzin pa dang / mi 'chang ba dang / kun
211a2(khri pa): chub par mi byed pa dang / mi klog pa dang / kha ton du mi byed pa dang / lung nod par mi byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ji
211a3(khri pa): skad bstan pa la nan tan du mi byed pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma phyin par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab
211a4(khri pa): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag dad pa dang / bzod pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / 'dod pa dang / mos pa dang /
211a5(khri pa): gtong pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang brtson pa mi gtong ba yod la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'ang yi ger 'dri zhing / de bzhin du
